A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 2 good plot lines and one bad one. Great performances from Isac\, Hamill\, Ridley\, and Driver. The chemistry between Ridley\, Driver\, and Hamill is amazing. The two weaknesses of this film is the Casino storyline and some comedy miss placed. thats why it gets a 4 stars from me and not 5. Great special effects good writing overall but not a perfect film by far but builds on the Star Wars mythology for sure.
